input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Ryan's Room Fluff and Fold Laundry Room

Item keywords:
7-piece set
Includes a cute little washer, dryer
Comes with ironing board with iron
Includes vacuum, mop and bucket
Keep your house tip-top
Scaled to fit your Ryan's Room dollhouse

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Keep your dollhouse neat and tidy with the Ryan's Room Fluff and Fold Laundry Room. This 7-piece set includes everything you need to keep your house tip-top, including a cute little washer, dryer, ironing board with iron, vacuum, mop and bucket. The pieces are scaled to fit your Ryan's Room dollhouse and will make the perfect addition to any dollhouse.
input_text.Response B:
With Fluff N Fold Laundry Room you can get set to keep your  house tip-top and spotlessly clean! This 7-piece set includes a cute little washer, dryer, ironing board with iron, vacuum, mop, and bucket, all scaled to fit your Ryans Room doll house. Household chores have never been so much fun as with the Fluff N Fold Laundry Room.
Get set to keep your house tip-top and spotlessly clean. This 7-piece set includes a cute little washer, dryer, ironing board with iron, vacuum, mop and bucket. Household chores have never been so mu

label_annotations.factors_a: Response A is very good and creates a very good product description
label_annotations.factors_b: Response B makes a spelling with "Fluff N Fold " and is inconsistent and contradicts itself for example it repeats the last Two sentences
